name: Condolence Puppet
text: Send "Gimmick Puppet" monsters with different names from your Deck to the GY, up to the the number of monsters your opponent controls that were Special Summoned from the Extra Deck +1. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Machine Xyz Monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by your opponentâ€™s card effects while face-up on the field. You can only use each effect of "Condolence Puppet" once per turn.
